---

This ornate pendant of brass is adorned with a vibrant blue gemstone. An _aluum charm_ grants control over a particular [aluum](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=113) and lesser influence over other such constructs. As long as you wear an aluum’s linked _aluum charm_, that aluum follows your verbal commands, including somewhat nuanced orders like “subdue this target” or “strike anyone wearing a blue robe.”
